insights: Your website uses a clear and logical heading structure (H1, H2, H3).
Your internal linking strategy effectively connects related content.
issues: Structured data (Schema.org) is missing from key pages, such as product and article pages.
Your URLs are not always human-readable or descriptive.
recommendations: Implement comprehensive Schema.org markup for all relevant content types.
Adopt a consistent and descriptive URL structure for all new content.
